A binaural fitting will provide the optimal information from the surroundings to ensure better localization and increased speech understanding.

trans-unit.source: As a noise source moves, the directional system adapts to determine the directional pattern that will best reduce surrounding noises originating from behind or to the side of the user.

trans-unit.source: Low resolution can result in poor sound quality and distortion. The hearing instrument wearer's experience in the garden environment is not perceived as natural.
trans-unit.target: Low resolution can result in poor sound quality and distortion. The hearing instrument wearer's experience in the garden environment is not perceived as natural.

trans-unit.source: Spatial Directionality takes advantage of the full power of the brain and creates a more natural listening experience. Allowing both an omnidirectional and a directional signal provides the auditory system with optimum input that allows the hearing instrument wearer to be aware of all sounds and speech at the same time. As the conversation starts behind the hearing instrument wearer, he is able to change focus to the conversation occurring behind him. By having the ability to consciously choose the listening source, the wearer is no longer limited by manual adjustments.
trans-unit.target: Spatial Directionality takes advantage of the full power of the brain and creates a more natural listening experience. Allowing both an omnidirectional and a directional signal provides the auditory system with optimum input that allows the hearing instrument wearer to be aware of all sounds and speech at the same time. As the conversation starts behind the hearing instrument wearer, he is able to change focus to the conversation occurring behind him. By having the ability to consciously choose the listening source, the wearer is no longer limited by manual adjustments.

trans-unit.source: Noise is not detected or suppressed, therefore, speech and noise are both amplified. The flight attendant's voice may not be easily audible to the hearing instrument wearer.
trans-unit.target: Noise is not detected or suppressed, therefore, speech and noise are both amplified. The flight attendant's voice may not be easily audible to the hearing instrument wearer.

trans-unit.source: The Feedback Eraser system uses a digital filter to suppress feedback without reducing the gain of the hearing instrument. The hearing instrument wearer is able to hear her spouse without annoying whistling sounds.
trans-unit.target: The Feedback Eraser system uses a digital filter to suppress feedback without reducing the gain of the hearing instrument. The hearing instrument wearer is able to hear her spouse without annoying whistling sounds.

trans-unit.source: The ambient noise is detected and suppressed, while speech is not. The result is clear speech with greater comfort and less listening fatigue for the hearing instrument wearer.
trans-unit.target: The ambient noise is detected and suppressed, while speech is not. The result is clear speech with greater comfort and less listening fatigue for the hearing instrument wearer.

trans-unit.source: The reduction in the signals from behind allows the hearing instrument user to hear the man speaking to her at the table.
trans-unit.target: The reduction in the signals from behind allows the hearing instrument user to hear the man speaking to her at the table.

trans-unit.source: This microphone system will amplify sounds from all directions around the hearing instrument wearer, giving him maximum environmental awareness. While listeners find this system comfortable, it typically does not improve listening in noisy environments.
trans-unit.target: This microphone system will amplify sounds from all directions around the hearing instrument wearer, giving him maximum environmental awareness. While listeners find this system comfortable, it typically does not improve listening in noisy environments.

trans-unit.source: The hearing instrument microphone picks up sounds coming from all directions. This may cause communication to be difficult in dynamic listening situations.
trans-unit.target: The hearing instrument microphone picks up sounds coming from all directions. This may cause communication to be difficult in dynamic listening situations.

trans-unit.source: There is no attenuation of wind noise, which leads to turbulent sound quality and poor speech understanding for the hearing instrument user.
trans-unit.target: There is no attenuation of wind noise, which leads to turbulent sound quality and poor speech understanding for the hearing instrument user.

trans-unit.source: When smaller venting is used in a hearing instrument, the occlusion effect or 'plugged up' feeling is increased. As a result, the hearing instrument wearer is bothered by hearing herself eating.
trans-unit.target: When smaller venting is used in a hearing instrument, the occlusion effect or 'plugged up' feeling is increased. As a result, the hearing instrument wearer is bothered by hearing herself eating.

trans-unit.source: When wind noise reduction is activated, the disturbance of turbulent air flow over the hearing instrument microphones is reduced. The benefit is improved speech understanding and better sound quality when outside in windy conditions.
trans-unit.target: When wind noise reduction is activated, the disturbance of turbulent air flow over the hearing instrument microphones is reduced. The benefit is improved speech understanding and better sound quality when outside in windy conditions.

trans-unit.source: With a monaural fit, a hearing instrument wearer might not be provided with complete information from their surroundings, resulting in decreased speech intelligibility and localization. A pedestrian wearing a monaural hearing aid may not notice the cars approaching when looking in the direction of the aided ear.
trans-unit.target: With a monaural fit, a hearing instrument wearer might not be provided with complete information from their surroundings, resulting in decreased speech intelligibility and localization. A pedestrian wearing a monaural hearing aid may not notice the cars approaching when looking in the direction of the aided ear.

trans-unit.source: With high-resolution Rapid signal processing technology, a high level of accuracy ensures excellent resolution for soft sounds and very low digital distortion. The benefits are optimal sound quality and natural, clear reception with no echo or artificial sound.
trans-unit.target: With high-resolution Rapid signal processing technology, a high level of accuracy ensures excellent resolution for soft sounds and very low digital distortion. The benefits are optimal sound quality and natural, clear reception with no echo or artificial sound.

trans-unit.source: With improvements in feedback suppression technology, larger venting, Open fittings can be achieved without whistling from the instrument. The hearing instrument wearer will likely not be disturbed by the sounds of eating.
trans-unit.target: With improvements in feedback suppression technology, larger venting, Open fittings can be achieved without whistling from the instrument. The hearing instrument wearer will likely not be disturbed by the sounds of eating.

trans-unit.source: Without the MSG calibration, sounds coming from the hearing instrument receiver loop back to the microphones, creating a risk for whistling and squealing.
trans-unit.target: Without the MSG calibration, sounds coming from the hearing instrument receiver loop back to the microphones, creating a risk for whistling and squealing.

trans-unit.source: A hearing aid in omni directional mode will receive and amplify sound from all directions around the wearer. While extremely comfortable in a quiet situation, an omni directional hearing aid can cause the wearer to have difficulty understanding speech in a noisy situation.
trans-unit.target: A hearing aid in omni directional mode will receive and amplify sound from all directions around the wearer. While extremely comfortable in a quiet situation, an omni directional hearing aid can cause the wearer to have difficulty understanding speech in a noisy situation.

trans-unit.source: A party is one of the most challenging listening environments. Multiple conversations and background music can contribute to difficulty in understanding a desired speaker. Prompt answers, dealing with fast changes in conversation and being able to focus are musts for social interaction.
trans-unit.target: A party is one of the most challenging listening environments. Multiple conversations and background music can contribute to difficulty in understanding a desired speaker. Prompt answers, dealing with fast changes in conversation and being able to focus are musts for social interaction.

trans-unit.source: A patented compression system which provides very low distortion and internal noise while offering extraordinary resolution for soft and mid-level signals. The result is clean, crisp, clear natural sound quality.
trans-unit.target: A patented compression system which provides very low distortion and internal noise while offering extraordinary resolution for soft and mid-level signals. The result is clean, crisp, clear natural sound quality.

trans-unit.source: A personalized volume setting, being exactly how the wearer prefers it, results in more audibility for soft speech in noise and more comfort in noise with less manual adjustments needed.
trans-unit.target: A personalized volume setting, being exactly how the wearer prefers it, results in more audibility for soft speech in noise and more comfort in noise with less manual adjustments needed.

trans-unit.source: Sounds received by each ear are delivered to the auditory perception areas in both sides of the brain. The brain integrates the subtle differences in the sounds at each ear to form a sound picture of the surroundings. One obvious advantage of binaural hearing is the ability to locate the direction of and distance to sound sources, which helps us feel oriented in the environment. Another important effect of binaural hearing is better understanding of speech in noisy surroundings. Hearing with two ears also makes it possible to separate and recognize sound sources, to pay attention to a sound while ignoring others, and to shift attention from one sound to another.
trans-unit.target: Mindkét fülben hallott hang átkerül a hallás érzékelés területére az agy mindkét oldalán. Az agy integrálja a minimális különbségeket a hangban mindkét fülből és környezeti hallásképpé alakítja. A binaurális hallás nyilvánvaló előnye a hangforrás helyének és irányának megtalálása, amely segít eligazodni a környezetben. Más fontos előnye a binaurális hallásnak a jobb beszédértés zajos környezetben. A kétfüles hallás szintén lehetővé teszi a hangforrások megkülönböztetését és felismerését, a hangra való figyelés, amíg másokat kiktatunk, és figyelmünket egyik hangról a másikra váltjuk.

trans-unit.source: The auditory system consists of the ear and pathways that take sound information to the brain, as well as the area of the brain in which sound is perceived.
trans-unit.target: The auditory system consists of the ear and pathways that take sound information to the brain, as well as the area of the brain in which sound is perceived.

trans-unit.source: The inner ear contains the sensory organs for hearing and balance. The snail-shaped cochlea is the part of the inner ear in which the organ of hearing is located. Sensitive hair cells in the cochlea convert the sound vibrations into electrical impulses that are carried through the auditory nerve to the brain.
trans-unit.target: The inner ear contains the sensory organs for hearing and balance. The snail-shaped cochlea is the part of the inner ear in which the organ of hearing is located. Sensitive hair cells in the cochlea convert the sound vibrations into electrical impulses that are carried through the auditory nerve to the brain.

trans-unit.source: The middle ear is a small air-filled cavity connected by the Eustachian tube to the back of throat. The Eustachian tube opens periodically to maintain normal air pressure in the middle ear. A chain of three small bones, the hammer (malleus), the anvil (incus) and the stirrup (stapes) conducts the sound vibrations from the eardrum to the inner ear.
trans-unit.target: The middle ear is a small air-filled cavity connected by the Eustachian tube to the back of throat. The Eustachian tube opens periodically to maintain normal air pressure in the middle ear. A chain of three small bones, the hammer (malleus), the anvil (incus) and the stirrup (stapes) conducts the sound vibrations from the eardrum to the inner ear.

trans-unit.source: The outer ear consists of an external part (the auricle or pinna), the ear canal and the eardrum (tympanic membrane). The purpose of the Pinna is to collect sound and transfer it to the ear canal. The ear canal directs sound to the eardrum and protects the middle ear. A self-cleaning system, it also produces earwax which captures debris as it naturally travels out of the ear canal. The eardrum which is located at the end of the ear canal is a thin, delicate membrane separating the cavity of the middle ear from the ear canal. Sound waves hitting the eardrum cause it to vibrate. These vibrations are transmitted to the middle ear.
trans-unit.target: The outer ear consists of an external part (the auricle or pinna), the ear canal and the eardrum (tympanic membrane). The purpose of the Pinna is to collect sound and transfer it to the ear canal. The ear canal directs sound to the eardrum and protects the middle ear. A self-cleaning system, it also produces earwax which captures debris as it naturally travels out of the ear canal. The eardrum which is located at the end of the ear canal is a thin, delicate membrane separating the cavity of the middle ear from the ear canal. Sound waves hitting the eardrum cause it to vibrate. These vibrations are transmitted to the middle ear.

trans-unit.source: This feature offers the user a clean, crisp, clear sound quality with no annoying 'amplified' quality.
trans-unit.target: This feature offers the user a clean, crisp, clear sound quality with no annoying 'amplified' quality.

trans-unit.source: This feature provides a constant awareness of the surrounding sound environment. The sound source of interest is based on the user's conscious listening focus - not the limitation of the hearing aid's directional system.
trans-unit.target: This feature provides a constant awareness of the surrounding sound environment. The sound source of interest is based on the user's conscious listening focus - not the limitation of the hearing aid's directional system.

trans-unit.source: This feature uses an environmental classifier to determine the different environments in which the hearing instrument user is in. Volume is automatically optimized to the user's needs and comfort in all environments. This will ensure optimal comfort in all environments.
trans-unit.target: This feature uses an environmental classifier to determine the different environments in which the hearing instrument user is in. Volume is automatically optimized to the user's needs and comfort in all environments. This will ensure optimal comfort in all environments.

trans-unit.source: This hearing aid continually monitors your surroundings to track and minimize stationary or moving outside noise. The benefit is increased speech understanding in any type of noise environment.
trans-unit.target: This hearing aid continually monitors your surroundings to track and minimize stationary or moving outside noise. The benefit is increased speech understanding in any type of noise environment.

trans-unit.source: This hearing aid reduces noise by canceling signals from behind the wearer. It also reduces noises to the side and behind the wearer.
trans-unit.target: This hearing aid reduces noise by canceling signals from behind the wearer. It also reduces noises to the side and behind the wearer.

trans-unit.source: This is a hearing aid fitting which does not occlude the ear canal. This is achieved either with a large vent on an earmold, or with a thin tube and dome fitting. Utilizing the benefits of Warp technology and advanced, feedback management, the wearer is able to experience sound quality without distortion, echo effects, or a 'plugged' occluded feeling.
trans-unit.target: This is a hearing aid fitting which does not occlude the ear canal. This is achieved either with a large vent on an earmold, or with a thin tube and dome fitting. Utilizing the benefits of Warp technology and advanced, feedback management, the wearer is able to experience sound quality without distortion, echo effects, or a 'plugged' occluded feeling.

trans-unit.source: This system consists of two components: a wind detection module and a wind reduction module. When the wind noise detector determines that the signal has air-flow turbulence that may be unpleasant and mask speech, a filter is applied to reduce the amount of amplification for the low frequencies where wind noise occurs.
trans-unit.target: This system consists of two components: a wind detection module and a wind reduction module. When the wind noise detector determines that the signal has air-flow turbulence that may be unpleasant and mask speech, a filter is applied to reduce the amount of amplification for the low frequencies where wind noise occurs.

trans-unit.source: This system uses a wind noise detector that actively reduces air-flow noise.
trans-unit.target: This system uses a wind noise detector that actively reduces air-flow noise.

trans-unit.source: This technology enables you hold objects such as a telephone close to the hearing aid without disturbing feedback.
trans-unit.target: This technology enables you hold objects such as a telephone close to the hearing aid without disturbing feedback.

trans-unit.source: Tiny voices of our loved ones are often difficult to hear due to the high pitch. Children's conversations can be hard to follow and may result in misunderstandings.
trans-unit.target: Tiny voices of our loved ones are often difficult to hear due to the high pitch. Children's conversations can be hard to follow and may result in misunderstandings.

trans-unit.source: Traffic situations are often confusing because of the accumulation of loud noises. Hearing loss interferes with your ability to orient yourself in your surroundings.
trans-unit.target: Traffic situations are often confusing because of the accumulation of loud noises. Hearing loss interferes with your ability to orient yourself in your surroundings.

trans-unit.source: When hearing loss exists in both ears, there are many advantages to a binaural vs. monaural hearing aid fitting. Among these advantages are better speech understanding in noise and better localization of sound. Studies have also shown that auditory deprivation can occur in the unaided ear when an individual with bilateral hearing loss is fit with only one hearing instrument.
trans-unit.target: When hearing loss exists in both ears, there are many advantages to a binaural vs. monaural hearing aid fitting. Among these advantages are better speech understanding in noise and better localization of sound. Studies have also shown that auditory deprivation can occur in the unaided ear when an individual with bilateral hearing loss is fit with only one hearing instrument.

trans-unit.source: Use this program when in everyday environments.

trans-unit.source: Use this program in situations where the sound the listener wants to hear is in front of the hearing aid user and the noise is behind.

trans-unit.source: This program is designed to give a richer sound when listening to music.
trans-unit.target: Ez a program gazdagabb hangot nyújt zenehallgatáshoz.

trans-unit.source: Use this program when in a very noisy surrounding to obtain more comfort.
trans-unit.target: Használja ezt a programot a nagyon zajos szituációkban a több komforttért.

trans-unit.source: This program is designed to give more comfort when walking, biking or driving in traffic.
trans-unit.target: Ez a program több komfortot nyújt amikor sétál, biciklizik vagy vezet a forgalomban.

trans-unit.source: This program is used during phone conversation. It will enhance the speech signal and eliminate the feedback squeal that can occur when using the phone.
trans-unit.target: Ez a program telefon beszélgetésre használható. Ez kiemeli a beszédet és kizárja a gerjedést, ami a telfonálás közben létrejön.

trans-unit.source: This program can be used when in a place that has a teleloop, e.g. churches, theaters, at home, for watching TV. This program will give the user the sound directly from the source into the hearing aid without the noise in the environment.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a programot indukciós hurokkal használhatja, pl. templomban, színházban és/ vagy otthoni TV nézésre. Ez a program a hangot közvetlenül a forrásból adja a hallókészülékbe a környezeti zaj nélkül.

trans-unit.source: This program can be used when in a place that has a teleloop, e.g. churches, theaters and/ or at home watching TV. This program will give the listener the sound directly from the source into the hearing aid combined with sound from the hearing aid's microphone allowing the user to hear if a person next them talks.
trans-unit.target: Ez a program olyan helyeken használható ahol van indukciós hurok, pl. templom, színház és/ vagy otthoni TV nézéskor. Ez a program egy direk hangot ad a hallókészülékbe, kombinálva azzal a hangal amely, a hallókészülék mikrofonjából, így hallható a viselő mellett alló beszéde is

trans-unit.source: Use this program when having a phone conversation on a phone with a magnetic field; this is often found in a normal landline telephone. This program will enhance the speech signal and eliminate the feedback squeal that can occur over the phone.
trans-unit.target: Használja ezt a programot telefon beszélgetésre mágneses mezővel; ez gyakori a normál vezetékes telefonnál. Ez a program kiemeli a beszédet és kizárja a gerjedést, ami telefonálás közben lép fel.

trans-unit.source: This program is only used for testing in the clinic.

Hearing instruments Connect the hearing instruments to the fitting software and go to the menu Instruments - Update Instruments’

Tartozékok: Csatlakoztassa a tartozékot a számítógéphez az USB kábellel, és futtassa a Tartozék frissítő eszközt.
Hallókészülék: Csatlakoztassa a hallókészüléket a az illesztő szoftverhez és futtassa a Készülék menüből a Készülék frissítést

trans-unit.source: Natural Directionality II takes advantage of the full power of the brain and creates a more natural listening experience. Allowing both an omnidirectional and a directional signal provides the auditory system with optimum input which enables the hearing instrument wearer to be aware of all sounds and speech at the same time. As the conversation starts behind the hearing instrument user, he is able to change focus to the more interesting conversation occurring behind him. By having the ability to consciously choose the listening source in which he is interested, the user is no longer limited by the directional system of the hearing aid or by manual adjustments.
trans-unit.target: A Természetes Direkcionalítás II az agy teljes kapcitásának előnyét adja és egy még természetesebb hallásélményt nyújt. Az elérhető az omnidirekcionális és a direkcionális jelet is ad a hallórendszer számára egy optimális bementtel, amely lehetővé teszi a viselő számára, hogy meghaljon minden hangot és beszédet egyidejüleg. Amint egy beszélgetés kezdődik a viselő mögött, megváltoztathatja a figyelem fókuszát, a számára fontosabb beszélgetés felé. Ezzel a lehetőséggel,m folyamatosan változtathatja a figyelem forrását arra ami fontos, a felhasználót többé nem limitálja a készülék direkcionális rendszere, vagy manuális beállítás.

trans-unit.source:
Smart Beam allows for adjustable beam widths: Narrow, Medium, and Wide .
The Smart Beam Steering option allows the system to automatically switch between Medium and Wide beam widths depending on the location of the speech and the signal-to-noise ratio in the environment.
trans-unit.target:
Smart Beam allows for adjustable beam widths: Narrow, Medium, and Wide .
The Smart Beam Steering option allows the system to automatically switch between Medium and Wide beam widths depending on the location of the speech and the signal-to-noise ratio in the environment.

trans-unit.source: With high-resolution Rapid signal processing technology, a high level of accuracy ensures excellent resolution for soft sounds and very low digital distortion. The benefits are optimal sound quality and natural, clear reception with no echo or artificial sound.
trans-unit.target: With high-resolution Rapid signal processing technology, a high level of accuracy ensures excellent resolution for soft sounds and very low digital distortion. The benefits are optimal sound quality and natural, clear reception with no echo or artificial sound.

trans-unit.source: Without DFS Ultra II activated, sounds coming from the hearing instrument receiver loop back to the microphones, creating a risk for whistling and squealing.
trans-unit.target: A DFS Ultra II aktiválása nélkül, a hallókészülék hallgatójából jövő hang visszakerül a mikrofonra, és emiatt gerjedés léphet fel.

trans-unit.source: The DFS Ultra II system uses a digital filter to suppress feedback without reducing the gain of the hearing instrument. The hearing instrument wearer is able to hear her spouse without annoying whistling sounds.

trans-unit.source:
The central auditory pathways are organized like circuits that interpret and decode the electrical signals sent from inner ears.
This processing begins as the auditory nerve enters the brainstem.
From this point, the neural pathway makes its way up to the cerebral cortex at the temporal lobe of the brain along the way switching back and forth from each side of the brainstem. Right ear information is directed to the left temporal lobe, and left ear information goes to the right temporal lobe. In addition, there is a transfer of information from one side of the brain to the other. In most people, the left side of the brain processes speech and other complex language functions, whereas tonal stimuli and music are deciphered by the right side of the brain.
trans-unit.target:

From this point, the neural pathway makes its way up to the cerebral cortex at the temporal lobe of the brain along the way switching back and forth from each side of the brainstem. Right ear information is directed to the left temporal lobe, and left ear information goes to the right temporal lobe. In addition, there is a transfer of information from one side of the brain to the other. In most people, the left side of the brain processes speech and other complex language functions, whereas tonal stimuli and music are deciphered by the right side of the brain.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the patient is sitting near the speaker.
trans-unit.target: Gyöződjön meg arról, hogy a páciens közel ül a hangszoróhoz.

trans-unit.source: Place the module on the patient’s ear while patient is facing the speaker. Bend the probe tube and place the tube opening in front of the reference microphone.
trans-unit.target: Helyezze a modult a páciens fülébe, mialatt a páciens a hangszoró felé néz. Hajlítsa a szonda csövét a és helyezze a csövet a referencia mikrofon elé.

trans-unit.source: Place the probe tube in the patient’s ear canal without the hearing instruments on the ears. For best measurements the probe tube tip should be no farther than 6mm from the ear drum.
trans-unit.target: Helyezze a szondacsövet a páciens hallójáratába, a hallókészülék ne legyen a fülön. A legjobb méréshez a szondacső vége ne legyen messzebb 6mm-nél a dobhártyától.

trans-unit.source: Insert the hearing instrument into the patient’s ear. Take care not to displace the probe tube already in the canal.
trans-unit.target: Helyezze a készüléket a páciens fülébe. Vigyázzon, hogy ne mozdítsa el a behelyezett szondát.

trans-unit.source: Select “Gain View” display option to view final gain curves for the selected input levels. Select “Accuracy View” display option to view final deviations from target. Select “Apply” to use these measurements to fit to target. If window is closed without “Apply” the current real ear data will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Válassza az ”Erősítés megtekintést"-t az erősítés görbék megtekintéséhez a kiválasztott bementi szintekhez. Válassza a Pontosság megtekintést" a végső összehasonlításhoz. Válassza az "Elfogadást" a mérések használatához a cél illesztéséhez. Ha az ablakot bezárja elfogadás nélkül a mostani adatok el fognak veszni.

trans-unit.source: Binaural Directionality uses information that is exchanged by the hearing instruments you are wearing. Depending on the mix of speech and noise and the location of the speech, the directionality mode will change. This will ensure the best listening conditions in all situations. Binaural Directionality allows you to focus on someone speaking but still be able to hear other sounds in your surroundings.
trans-unit.target: A Binaurális Direkcionalitás/Binaurális Direkcionalítás II azokat az információkat használja amiket a készülékek cserélnek egymás között. A beszéd és zaj mixétől valamint a beszéd helyétől függően, a direkcionalítás váltani fog. Ez bizutosítja a legjobb hallási kondiciókat minden szituációban. A Binaurális Direkcionalítás lehetővé teszi a fókuszálást valaki beszédjére, de ugyankkor képes marad hallani más hangokat is a környezetéből.

trans-unit.source: Natural Directionality allows you to have constant awareness of the surrounding sound environment. Consequently the sound source of interest is based on your conscious listening decision.
trans-unit.target: A Természetes direkcionalítás lehetővé teszi, hogy folyamatosan figyelje a környezetét. Tehát a hangforrás észlelése az egyéni eszlelésre van alapozva.

trans-unit.source: The Environmental Optimizer II recognizes what type of listening environment you are in, and automatically adjusts the volume and the amount of noise reduction for optimum listening comfort and sound quality.
trans-unit.target: A Környezeti optimalizáló II felismeri, hogy milyen halláskörnyezetben van, és automatikusan állítja a hangerőt és a zajszűrés mértékét az optimális figyelési komforthoz és hangminőséghez.

trans-unit.source: This feature adjusts level of directional focus, depending on the location of the speaker of interest and the surrounding sound. If there is only one person speaking in front of you, without other sounds interfering, the focus is narrowed. If there are multiple sources of sound, coming from the side or from the back, the focus is broadened.
trans-unit.target: A direkcionális állítási szintje, függ a beszélő helyétől és a hangkörnyezettől. Ha csak egy ember beszél Ön elött, semmilyen más hang nincs, a fókusz szükebb. Ha több hangforrás van, ami oldalról vagy hátulról ad hangot a fókusz kiszélesedik.

trans-unit.source: NoiseTracker II reduces unwanted background noise without affecting the quality of speech. This gives you increased listening comfort in all types of listening environments.
trans-unit.target: A NoiseTracker II csökkenti a háttérzajt, de a beszédre nincs káros hatással. Ez megnöveli a hallási komfortot minden halláskörnyezetben.

trans-unit.source: WindGuard senses when wind is present and reduces the level of noise caused by the wind blowing on the hearing instruments. This provides better listening comfort in outdoor environments.
trans-unit.target: A WindGuard érzékeli mikor van szél és csökkenti a zajszintet, amit a szél okoz a hallókészülékben. Ez jobb viselésii komfortot biztosít kültéri eseményeken.

trans-unit.source: Expansion reduces the hissing that can sometimes be heard with hearing instruments in very quiet environments. A typical scenario would be when you hear the noise from your refrigerator. The higher level of expansion, the more unwanted low-level noise is eliminated.
trans-unit.target: Az Expanzió csökkenti a sziszegést ami néha hallható a hallókészülékben csendes környezetben. A tipikus példa amikor a hűtőgép zaját hallja. A magasabb szintű expanzió megszünteti a nemkívánt mélyfrekvenciás zajt.

trans-unit.source: Feedback is the unwanted whistling or buzzing noise that a hearing instrument can make. DFS Ultra II cancels feedback, resulting in clear sound without embarrassing whistling. It also prevents whistling when you hold a phone or your hand up to your ear. DFS Ultra II includes a special Music Mode that is optimized to provide the best sound quality for music listening.
trans-unit.target: A gerjedés egy nemkívánt sipolás vagy zörgés, amit a hallókészülék generál. A DFS Ultra II megszünteti a gerjedést, tiszta hangot biztosít bántó sipolás nélkül. Az szintén okozhat gerjedést ha a telefont vagy a kezét a füléhez emeli. A DFS Ultra II tartalmaz egy speciális Zene módot, amely a legjobb hangminőséget biztosítja a zenehallgatás közben.

trans-unit.source: A primary goal of fitting amplification is to provide access to as much speech information as possible, for improving audibility of high frequency sounds is frequency lowering. This term refers to sound processing strategies that move information from higher frequency areas to lower frequency areas, where audibility is better. The idea behind frequency lowering is that audibility of these sounds even at “misplaced” frequencies is more beneficial than no audibility at all.
trans-unit.target: Az elsődleges célja az illesztési erősítésnke az, hogy a lehető legtöbb beszédinformációt biztosítsa, jobb hallhatóságot a magas frekvenciákon a frekvencia áthajtás biztosít. Ez a hengfeldolgozási mód azt jelenti, hogy a magas frekvenciás hangokat levisszük a mélyebb frekvenciákra, ahol jobban hallható. Az ötlet a frekvencia lehajtás mögött az, hogy ezek a hangok meghallása, még egy rossz helyre tett frekvencián is jobb, mint egyátalán nem hallani.

trans-unit.source: It is common for those with severe-to-profound hearing loss to rely on even more low frequency gain than prescribed by the fitting rationale. To accommodate this need, Low Frequency Boost provides a quick way to increase low frequency gain in three discrete steps to enhance audibility, loudness, and fullness of sound quality for these individuals.
trans-unit.target: Közös ezekben a hallásmaradványos hallásvesztésekben az, hogy több mély frekvenciás erősítést igényelnek, mint azt az illesztés biztosítana. Hogy kielégítsük ezt a szükségletet, a Mély frekvenciás Boost biztosít gyors utat a mélyfrekvenciás erősítés növelésére, három lépésben a hallhatóság kiegyenlítéséhze, hangossághoz, és a teljes hangminőség eléréséhez

trans-unit.source: It can sometimes be difficult to get used to new hearing instruments. The Acceptance Manager slowly adjusts the gain to the optimum setting for your hearing loss over a period of time where you are wearing the hearing instruments. This allows you to gradually adjust to your new hearing instruments.
trans-unit.target: Néha nehéznek bizonyul egy új hallókészülék használata. Az Acceptance Manager lassan állítja be az erősítést az optimális szintre fa hallásvesztéséhez, azalatt az idő alatt, amikor viseli a készüléket. Ez lehetővé teszi azt, hogy Ön fokozatosan állítsa be az új hallókészüléket.

trans-unit.source:
In addition to using the ear-to-ear wireless link to determine the best directionality mode for the environment, Binauaral Directionality II introduces pinna restoration and bilateral compression to provide for more natural sound processing when both instruments switch to omni directional mode.
Pinna restoration allows for directivity that mimics the way the natural ear treats sound. This helps you with both speech understanding and sound localization.
Bilateral compression aids in preserving the natural loudness differences between the ears. The Ear-to-Ear wireless link ensures that there is minimal impact on the spatial information when sound is processed through the hearing instruments.
Binaural Directionality II is designed to be as transparent as possible in order to maximize the positive effects of spatial hearing and facilitate listening in noisy environments.
trans-unit.target:
A készülékek közötti vezeték nélküli kommunikáció megállapítja a legjobb direkcionális módot a környezethez, a Binaurális Direkcionalítás II bemutatja a cimpa pinna helyreállítást és a bilaterális kompressziót, ami még természetesebb hangfeldolgozást tesz lehetővé.
A cimpa helyreállítás teszi lehetővé a természetes hangérzetet. Ez segít a beszédértésben és a lokalizációban.
A Bilaterális kompresszió biztosítja a természetes hangosság különbséget a fülek között. A készülékek közötti vezeték nélküli kapcsolat biztosítja a minimális hatást a térbeli információkra, amikor a hang áthalad a hallókészüléken.
A Binaurális Direkcionalítás II a lehető legáttekinthetőbbre lett tervezve, hogy maximalizálja a térbeli hallás pozitív hatását és megkönnyíti a hallást zajos környezetben.

trans-unit.source: Nature Sounds use the natural modulation characteristics of real life environmental sounds. Each Nature Sounds option is modulated to mimic the corresponding environmental setting. For example, the natural modulation characteristic of waves breaking on rocks is different than that of calm waves in the ocean. By selecting a Nature Sounds stimulus you are providing the user with a calming, comfortable sound experience as an alternative to traditional white noise. The sound selected should be determined by user preference, as therapeutic sounds for tinnitus have great individual variance.
trans-unit.target: A Természetes Hangok természetes modulációt használ a valós környeztnek megfelelően. Minden Természetes Hang modulálva van a környezeti beállítások szerint. Például, a sziklán megtört hullámok természetes modulációja, különbözik a tengeri hullámokétól. A Természetes Hangok kiválasztásával, egy nyugodt, komfortos hangot biztosít a felhasználónak, mint egy alternatív fehérzajt. A Természetes Hangok kiválaszthatók a felhasználói előnyökben, terápiás hangként a tinnitusban szenvedőknek.

trans-unit.source: Crosslink Directionality with Personal Sound I.D.
trans-unit.target: Crosslink Directionality with Personal Sound I.D.

Pinna restoration allows for directivity that mimics the way the natural ear treats sound. This helps you with both speech understanding and sound localization. Bilateral compression is introduced to preserve the natural loudness differences between the ears.
The Ear to Ear wireless link ensures that there is minimal impact on the spatial information when sound is processed through the hearing instruments. Crosslink with Personal Sound I.D. is designed to be as transparent as possible in order to maximize the positive effects of spatial hearing and facilitate listening in noisy environments.

trans-unit.source:
Speech Spotter allows the microphone mode to change from omni directional to directional and vice versa depending on the speech to noise ratio in the environment. This means that in an environment where the signal to noise ratio is deemed to be poor, the system will switch to an adaptive directional pattern with variable beam widths (Narrow, Medium, Wide, and Smart Beam Steering).
In addition to automatically changing the microphone mode from oni directional to directional, Speech Spotter Pro also utilizes the Mixing Point Frequency and Smart Beam features when in directional mode.
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.source:
The Beltone Direct Line accessories transmit sound wirelessly from an audio source like a TV, PC, or stereo directly to Beltone wireless enabled hearing aids, so you don’t need the cords or wires often required by other manufacturers. This direct connection helps reduce competing noise (such as background conversations) and allows you the freedom to tune in to the song, movie or even a specific person you want to hear.
The Phone Link allows you the freedom to talk on a mobile phone hands free via a Bluetooth link. Once paired with the Phone Link, the mobile phone will ring in the hearing aid. Once answered a clear, feedback-free speech signal is channeled directly from the phone into the ears.
trans-unit.target:

This direct connection helps reduce competing noise (such as background conversations) and allows you the freedom to tune in to the song, movie or even a specific person you want to hear.
The Phone Link allows you the freedom to talk on a mobile phone hands free via a Bluetooth link. Once paired with the Phone Link, the mobile phone will ring in the hearing aid. Once answered a clear, feedback-free speech signal is channeled directly from the phone into the ears.

trans-unit.source:
The Beltone Direct Line accessories transmit sound wirelessly from an audio source like a TV, PC, or stereo directly to Beltone wireless enabled hearing aids, so you don’t need the cords or wires often required by other manufacturers. This direct connection helps reduce competing noise (such as background conversations) and allows you the freedom to tune in to the song, movie or even a specific person you want to hear.
The Personal Audio Link (myPAL) is a remote microphone that can be placed near whatever you want to hear, like a TV, phone, or person speaking. Ultimately, the myPAL allows you the freedom to choose the audio source you want to hear and have that audio sent directly to your hearing instruments.
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.source:
The Beltone Direct Line accessories transmit sound wirelessly from an audio source like a TV, PC, or stereo directly to Beltone wireless enabled hearing aids, so you don’t need the cords or wires often required by other manufacturers. This direct connection helps reduce competing noise (such as background conversations) and allows you the freedom to tune in to the song, movie or even a specific person you want to hear.
The TV Link streams audio directly to the hearing aid, allowing the TV volume to remain at a comfortable level for others in the room. The TV Link can also be used with other audio sources like home stereos and PCs.
The Remote Control allows you to discreetly monitor and change environmental programs and adjust the volume of the hearing aids. It also allows you to turn on and adjust the volume of the streaming sound, from the TV.
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.source: Spatial Sense is an omnidirectional listening mode designed to maximize the positive effects of spatial hearing. Spatial Sense consists of pinna restoration and bilateral compression to provide for more natural sound processing. Pinna restoration allows for directivity that mimics the way the natural ear treats sound. This helps you with both speech understanding and sound localization. Bilateral compression is introduced to preserve the natural loudness differences between the ears.
trans-unit.target: A Térbeli hallás egy omnidirekcionális mód, amely a térbeli hallás pozitív hatásait maximalizálja. A Természetes Érzés tartalmaz egy cimpa helyreállítást és egy bilaterális kompressziót, amely még természetesebb hallást biztósít. A cimpa helyreállítás lehetővé teszi a direkcionalítás természetes kezelését. Ez segít az értésben és a lokalizációban. A Bilaterális kompresszió segít megőrizni a természetes hangosság különbségeket a fülek között.

trans-unit.source: With the use of Ear-to-Ear communication, the Comfort Phone feature automatically reduces the gain on the non-phone ear. This feature allows the instrument user the ability to comfortably hear their phone conversation while reducing the competing environmental noise. This reduction in gain is automatically built into the Phone Now functionality when the D2D communication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: A készülékek közötti kommunikáció használatával, a Comfort Phone automatikusan csökkenti az erősítést a nem telefonáló fülön. Ez lehetővé teszi, hogy a készülék használó jobban hallja a beszélgetést, amíg a környezeti zaj csökkenni fog. Ez az automatikus erősítés csökkentés automatikus a Phone Now funkcióban, amikor a D2D kommunikáció engedélyezve van.

trans-unit.source: The feature allows the hearing instrument to automatically switch to a dedicated phone program. A special magnet must be placed on the phone handset in order to trigger this change.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tuljadonság lehetővé teszi, hogy készülék automtikusan a dedikált telefon programba kapcsoljon. A speciális mágnest a telefonra kell helyezni, hogy ezt a változást lehetővé tegye.

trans-unit.source: Feedback is the unwanted whistling or buzzing noise that a hearing instrument can make. DFS Ultra cancels feedback, resulting in clear sound without embarrassing whistling. It also prevents whistling when you hold a phone or your hand up to your ear.
trans-unit.target: A gerjedés egy nem kívánt sípolás vagy csörgő hang, amit a hallókészülék hoz létre. A DFS Ultra megakadályozza a gerjedést, így eredményezve tiszta hangot bántó sipolás nélkül. Létrejöhet gerjedés amikor a telefont tartja vagy a füléhez emeli.

trans-unit.source: NoiseTracker II reduces unwanted background noise without affecting the quality of speech. This gives you increased listening comfort in all types of listening environments.
trans-unit.target: A NoiseTracker II csökkenti a nem kívánt zajt, anélkül, hogy a beszéd minősége rosszabb lenne. Ez megnöveli a figyelési komfortot minden halláskörnyezetben.

trans-unit.source: Binaural Fitting Data from Left Instrument cannot be read into Monaural session.
trans-unit.target: A Binaurális illesztési adatok a bal készülékből nem olvashatóak be a monaurális bejegyzésbe.

trans-unit.source: With Made for iPhone, your hearing aids work like wireless stereo headphones for telephone calls, listening to music and any other audio. Triple click to adjust hearing aid volume and change programs.
trans-unit.target: A Made for iPhone-al, a hallókészüléke sztereó fülhalgatóként működik telefonáláskor, zene hallgatáskor. 3 klikk és másris állíthatja a hangerőt vagy programot válthat.

trans-unit.source: Streams clear stereo sound from the TV, stereo, computer or other audio device directly to the hearing instruments, while allowing users to stay aware of what’s going on around them. Supports both analogue and digital inputs.
trans-unit.target: Tiszta sztereó hangsugárzás a TV-ből, rádióból, computer-ből vagy más audió eszközből a hallókészülékbe, és lehetővé téve a felhasználónak, hogy figyelemmel kísérje mi történik körülötte. Analóg és digitális bemgatva vannak.

trans-unit.source:
RESOUND MICRO MIC Extremely easy to use, the Micro Mic pairs to any wireless ReSound hearing aid in seconds. When your client clips it on to the clothing of the person they want to hear, they can enjoy conversation even in background noise. With a range of up to 25 metres in clear line of sight, the Micro Mic is ideal for use on shopping trips, in busy cafes or for talking in the car.
RESOUND MULTI MIC The Multi Mic can do everything the Micro Mic can. But placed horizontally on the table, its automatically switches into a mode optimized for picking up the voices of multiple speakers. The Multi Mic also connects to FM (FM receiver required) and loop systems, and has a mini-jack input for streaming audio from virtually any device with a headphones output.
trans-unit.target:
RESOUND MICRO MIK Nagyon könnyű használható, a MIkro MIk párósítható minden wireless ReSound hallókészülékkel, pillanatok alatt. Amikor a páciens felcsippenti annak a ruhájára, akit hallani szeretne, élvezheti a beszélgetést a háttérzaj ellenére is. 25 méteres körben hazsnálható az eszköz, a Mikro Mik ideális a bevásárlásokhoz, kávézáshoz, vagy a kocsiban való beszélgetésre.
RESOUND MULTI MIK
A Multi Mik mindent tud amit a Mikro Mik tud. De amikor horizontálisan az asztalra helyezi, automatikusan átkapcsol egy olyan módba, amely optimalizált a többemberes beszélgetésre. A Multi Mik csatlakoztatható FM és húrok rendszerekhez, ésel van látva egy mini-jack bemenettel az audio jel sugárzáshoz egy olyan eszközből , aminek fejhallgató kimenete van.

trans-unit.source: Streams phone conversations and as well as stereo sound directly from your Bluetooth device directly to both hearing instruments, whether you are in the office, on the move, or at home. Offers basic remote control functionality when not on the phone and clips easily onto clothing.
trans-unit.target: Átsugároz telefon beszélgetést sztereó hangként a Bluetooth eszközéből közvetlenül mindkét hallókészülékbe, bárhol is van, irodában, menet közben, vagy otthon. Alap távirányító funkciókat kínál amikor nem telefonál és a ruhájára csipteti.

trans-unit.source: Gives visual and intuitive control over hearing instruments and accessories. For personal preference the Remote Control 2 also offer on the fly balance adjustments between hearing instrument volume streamed audio level.
